passover.style: box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 56px; padding-bottom: 104px; padding-inline: 39px;

children.style: display: grid; gap: 65px 30px; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(350px, 1fr)); margin-inline: auto; margin-top: 119px; max-width: 69.375em; width: 100%;

extend.style: background-color: var(--main-background-color2); border-radius: 6px; box-sizing: border-box; min-height: 228px; width: 100%;
box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; flex-direction: column; height: 100%; padding: 49px 32px 32px 32px; position: relative; width: 100%;

color: var(--main-h2-color); font-size: 20px; font-weight: bold; margin-top: 9px;
color: #5964E0; font-size: 14px; font-weight: bold; margin-top: auto;

children.style: align-items: center; align-self: center; background-color: #5964E0; border: none; border-radius: 5px; color: white; cursor: pointer; display: flex; font-family: 'Kumbh Sans', serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; justify-content: center; max-width: 141px; min-height: 48px; width: 100%;

passover.style: align-items: center; background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.5); box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; height: 100%; justify-content: center; left: 0; opacity: 0; padding: 24px; pointer-events: none; position: fixed; top: 0; transition: opacity 300ms; user-select: none; width: 100%;

children.style: background-color: var(--main-background-color2); border-radius: 6px; box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; flex-direction: column; min-height: 217px; padding: 24px; transition: background-color 300ms; width: 100%;
